summary: Beg mercy if wounded and strike back mocking. Every cool kids do that
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][img]http://i60.tinypic.com/v4m1zn.jpg[/img]
[size=3]Children Voice Pack for Additional Player Voices for Skyrim by Nanahane. Including UI FX: Alchemy (only alchemy fail), Enchanting (only
recharge), Health heartbeat (critical health voice with gasp/wounded
breathing), Lockpicking (pickbreak & unlock) and Sneak attack hit.
Player will comment or say something when:
1. Shoot a bow or crossbow
2. Discover a new place
3. Getting hit/damage 25%, 50%, or 75%
4. Absorbing dragon soul
5. Entering dungeon
6. Entering combat
7. Raising Skill or Level up
8. Mounting horse
9. Sneaking
10. Killing an enemy (kill1) and when your follower kills enemy (kill2)
11. Casting offensive spell (cast1) and defensive spell (cast2)[/size]

[/size][youtube]OnPt3LAtaUw[/youtube]Â  [youtube]VRf6xfaup4Q[/youtube]

[size=3]Update log
v1.1
New Lockpicking and sneakattack fx.
v1.2
New Alchemy, Enchanting and Health heartbeat fx.

Installation use NMM or:
1. Extract the archive.
2. Merge the data folder with your Skyrim Data folder.
Uninstall:
Do reverse

Recommended
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555/?]RS Children Overhaul by Ranaline[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56670/?]Armor and Clothing for Kids by PlagueHush[/url]
Requirements
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21215]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim[/url]
See also
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61878/?]Grumpy Sound FX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61406/?]Badass Voice Pack[/url]
CREDITS
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4911907]Nanahane
[/url][/size]
